page.title: Karl Lorey: Founder, Builder, Investor
page.description: A page about me, my work, and what I'm building.
page.content:
# Founder, Builder, Investor

<Signature />

Karl Lorey is a computer scientist, entrepreneur, and venture capitalist. He studied computer science at the University of Würzburg and at Karlsruhe Institute of Technology. During his studies he published three scientific papers and wrote his master thesis on the impact of personality on programmers' online behavior. His focus is data analysis, machine learning, and scraping. He has also founded several companies, including Germany's first student-run venture capital firm.

<LatestProjects />

<LatestPosts />

This page is heavily inspired by the beautiful page of [Kenneth Reitz](https://www.kennethreitz.org/) and [The Minimalists](https://www.theminimalists.com/). Its [code is available on GitHub](https://github.com/lorey/karllorey.com).
